google.title: Delete Google
google.description: Don't be ignorant to Google. They have just as much if not more data on you than Facebook. There are alternatives.

linkedin.title: Delete LinkedIn
linkedin.description: Constant use of dark patterns in an attempt to harvest more data from your contacts.

twitter.title: Delete Twitter
twitter.description: Twitter can be a dark place full of angry people.

instagram.title: Delete Instagram
instagram.description: Instagram is pretty and you can go private but it's still distracting and it's part of the Facebook Group.

whatsapp.title: Delete Whatsapp
whatsapp.description: To be fair, Whatsapp is pretty secure. It's unfortunate then that they're part of the Facebook Group and share metadata.

reddit.title: Delete Reddit
reddit.description: A rabbit hole of distraction. Could get bumped off the list at any moment.
